page.title: 12Gazette News w/e 19/7/85
page.content: The headline for the week was {'TREACHERY'.}This was when the health chiefs of Waltham Forest Health Authority were accused by the EFCC (Epping Forest County Council) of treachery because orders have been given to close Forest Hospital after assurances that it would stay open. Other headlines stories included a local builder who had all his tools stolen from his van, and{'Neighbours {To The Rescue In Kitchen Blaze',}when a pensioner and some neighbours fought a really ferocious kitchen fire in Colebrook Gardens, saving the house from being gutted. { { }In the{1985 Prodigal Son Returns} some children from our school were in the paper because of the church service that they took part in. {
